tag_list: new-media, streaming-media, content-management-system, cms, audionet, broadcast-com
overview:
Patrick Seaman is a New Media Pioneer. Patrick launched or helped launch seven new media and technology companies and co-authored the first major book on Internet broadcasting, WebSite Sound. At AudioNet / Broadcast.com (merged with Yahoo! in ‘99), Patrick pioneered the new media revolution as employee # 1, Director of Technology & VP of International Development and on the board of Directors of Broadcast.com Japan.

After broadcast.com:

  • CEO, Timberwolf Press
  • CTO, Buytone.com
  • Chief Technologist, Deer Channel
  • COO, CTO, WhichBox Media
  • COO, Cinsay
  • Partner, Chief Technology Advisor @ Pepperwood Partners

Patrick helped launch whichboxmedia.com, a SaaS company that provides a next generation content creation and management, online publishing, social networking, and social media technology platform. WhichBox Media is a winner of the 2010 â€œOnMedia 100â€ Award for the top 100 most disruptive companies in online media, and, one of the 2010 Worldâ€™s Best Technologies top 100 companies and winner of the youngStartup “Top Innovator” Award at the 2010 NY Venture Summit.

Most recently, Patrick helped helped launch Cinsay, a video eCommerce SaaS company, as COO and later as Chief Strategy Officer
